name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：3002015或負責教授同意。認識標準與規範、規範的應用、軸承設計實務、密封裝置設計、移位齒輪、潤滑設計實務、旋轉機件的慣性及啟動問題、驅動元件之選用。
schedule:
1. Screws & Fasteners (1 week)
2. Welding & Bonding (1 week)
3. Mechanical Springs (2 weeks)
4. Rolling-Contact Bearings (2 weeks)
5. Lubrication and Journal Bearings (2 week)
6. Gears-General (1 week)
7. Spur, Helical, Bevel and Worm Gears (2 weeks)
8. Clutches, Brakes, Couplings, and Flywheels (3 weeks)
9. Flexible Mechanical Elements (1 week)
scorePolicy:
1. 平時表現 10％
2. 第一次期中考 30％
3. 第二次期中考 30％
4. 期末考 30％
materials:
教科書：Design of Machine Elements, 8th edition, by M.F. Spotts, T. E. Shoup, and Hornberger, 2004, Prentice-Hall, Inc. 高立圖書公司.
參考書：
1. Fundamentals of Machine Component Design, 3rd edition, by R.C. Juvinall, and K.M. Marshek, 2000, John Wiley & Sons. 新月圖書公司
2. Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design, 9th edition in SI units, by Budynas & Nisbett, 新月圖書，02-23114027
3. Machine Elements in Mechanical Design, 5th ed., By R.L. Mott, 歐亞書局，02-89121188
